DOC.brief_summary: 'ThRIL' aims to explore the feasibility, safety and efficacy of TR002, a regulatory cell therapy, as adjunct immunosuppressive treatment in the context of liver transplantation
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Regulatory T Cell Therapy in Liver Transplant Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Stage I: To evaluate the safety of administering TR002 to liver transplant recipients. Stage II: To evaluate the efficacy of TR002 administration in allowing for the discontinuation of immunosuppressive therapy in liver transplant recipients.
